abstract: Community leaders and activists in Cleveland directly petition court to file criminal charges against Police Officers Timothy Loehmann and Frank Garmback in shooting death of 12-year-old Tamir Rice in November 2014; unusual move is motivated by frustration with slow pace of investigation into Rice's death.
lead_paragraph: Community leaders and activists voiced frustration with the pace of the official response to the death of the 12-year-old, who was fatally shot on Nov. 22.

headline.main: Group Asks Court to Order Arrest of Cleveland Officers in Tamir Rice Case

snippet: Community leaders and activists voiced frustration with the pace of the official response to the death of the 12-year-old, who was fatally shot on Nov. 22.
